SysFileWrite (FUN)
SysFileWrite (FUN)
Â¶
FUNCTION SysFileWrite : __XWORD
Write number of bytes to the file. File must be opened with
AM_WRITE
or
AM_APPEND
.
InOut:
Scope
Name
Type
Comment
Return
SysFileWrite
__XWORD
Number of bytes written to the file. 0=if failed
Input
hFile
RTS_IEC_HANDLE
Handle of the file
pbyBuffer
POINTER TO BYTE
Pointer to buffer with data to write to file
ulSize
__XWORD
Number of bytes to write in the file. Must be less or equal
the buffer size!
pResult
POINTER TO RTS_IEC_RESULT
Pointer to runtime system error code (see CmpErrors.library)
top
